contentheadline.headline: Xenoglossalgia: The Last Stage of Awareness

contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Xenoglossalgia: The Last Stage of Awareness | Type = studio | Artist = [[Rwake]] | Cover = rwake.jpg | Released = 1998 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Sludge metal]] | Length = 24:10 | Label = | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = '''Xenoglossalgia: The Last Stage of Awareness'''<br/>(1998) | Next album = [[Absence Due to Projection]]<br/>(1999) }} '''''Xenoglossalgia: The Last Stage of Awareness''''' is the original demo by [[Rwake]]. It was released in 1998, then re-released through [[House of Mummble]] in 2004. It has a total running time of 24 minutes and 10 seconds. ==Track listing== # "Intro" – 2:42 # "Stairwell" – 6:14 # "Ordie" – 7:38 # "Intro" – 3:26 # "Nagarachi" – 4:10 ==Personnel== * [[C.T. (Rwake)|C.T.]] ([[Singer|Vocals, Samples]]) * [[Gravy (Rwake)|Gravy]] ([[Electric guitar|Guitar]]) * [[Chris Newman (musician)|Chris Newman]] ([[Electric guitar|Guitar]]) * [[Aaron (Rwake)|Aaron]] ([[Bass guitar|Bass]]) * [[Jeff Morgan]] ([[Snare drum|Drums]]) * Rob ([[Keyboard instrument|Keyboard]]) ([[Backing vocals]]) {{DEFAULTSORT:Xenoglossalgia: The Last Stage Of Awareness}} [[Category:Rwake albums]] [[Category:1998 albums]]
